text: 2.15: 1 Ko 11.2; 16.13; Fi 4.1; 2 Te 3.6Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde nza phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi nde guigira thɨgɨ havhargiri. Nde thɨgɨ havhargip, nde nza mba Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ bun nde suaŋgi, nde nta suira havhargip, nde vhɨra nza kha gava khergiap, nde nzuai buni, nde vhɨra nta suirav havhargiri.
